vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.15.19
§ Ittai or Ithai = "with me"
1) a Gittite commander from Gath in David's army
2) one of David's 30 mighty warriors, a Benjamite
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) אִיתַי   hijo de Ribai; guerrero; en tiempos de David; (b)   amigo de David; de Gat
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以太 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "和我在一起"
1) 一位迦特人的首領, 後投效在大衛王的麾下
2) 一位便雅憫人, 是大衛王的卅個大能勇士之一 (撒下 23:29;代上 11:31)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以太 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "和我在一起"
1) 一位迦特人的首领, 后投效在大卫王的麾下
2) 一位便雅悯人, 是大卫王的卅个大能勇士之一 (撒下 23:29;代上 11:31)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.23.29;
son of: Ribai (H7380); also called Ithai at 1Ch.11.31;
§ Ittai or Ithai = "with me"
1) a Gittite commander from Gath in David's army
2) one of David's 30 mighty warriors, a Benjamite
